    Introduction

    This site is a compilation of my notes on math, cognitive science, and computer science. Here, you'll find a collection of projects I've worked on, ranging from developing video games to applications, and bottling. Explore the featured projects below to learn more about each one. Whether you're interested in programming, gaming, or scientific simulations.
